import React, {useState} from 'react' export default function QuestionView() { const quizTitle = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("title"))[0] const quizDescription = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("description"))[0] const [quizData, setQuizData] = useState( { title: quizTitle, description: quizDescription, questions: [] } ) const [questionsData, setQuestionsData] = useState( { question: "", answerType: "", correctAnswer: "", answers: [] } ) const [answerData, setAnswerData] = useState("") return ( <>
